page.title: 01GENERAL FEATURES
page.content: The area consists of a coastal plain bordering the eastern shore of the {River Severn}just below the Severn Bridge. The river part shows the English Stones, English Lake, Salmon Pool and mud and gravel banks at low tide. Below this runs the{Severn} {Tunnel,}a railway tunnel linking England to South Wales. The eastern half of our block is land, intensively managed grass land and fields with scattered farm buildings and old cottages. Many of the fields are bordered by deep drainage channels locally called{rhines,}pronounced 'reens'. The main centres of habitation are {Pilning}and{Severn Beach,}the old cottages in the countryside have generally been renovated. Most of the people who live in this area work on farms nearby or commute to Bristol or
